text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
After drawing a sun with a smiley face, 
hit both shoulders 3 times!
(Tap, tap, tap!)

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Alright! With this, MiRules for Business Trip Support 
are all clear! Thanks for going along with it♪

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
But still……I'm jealous, it's Hokkaido! 
I really wanted to go with you too～

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Even then! Because it's Hokkaido, you know? 
Awww～ I'm 50 Miles of jealous!

……Honestly, I was surprised she wanted to go to Hokkaido 
that badly. I made a mental note to buy a bunch of souvenirs.

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Wah! Cheese dressing made in Hokkaido! 
……And this is Sweet Corn dressing!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Chocolate, and some others……there's so much! 
Can I really have this? To think I'd get so much!
choice_data_list: You really wanted to go too

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Ah, ehehe……in that respect, I was really jealous! Because it 
was Hokkaido, you know? It was a chance to ride an airplane!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Well, you see, Trainer-san! 
I'll just ask——

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: Miles! How many did you save up!?

What does she mean? ……I thought about 
it for a while, and eventually had an idea.
choice_data_list: Do you mean like from flying?

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
That's right! 
If it was Hokkaido, you must have saved a lot!

Her reddish eyes were sparkling. 
Infront of that gaze I felt a bit sorry——but.

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: Eh? You didn't save any……?

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: You didn't save any!?

Was that really so surprising……? 
She was so shocked that even I was surprised.

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Of course! All the Miles I've saved up 
until now, are all recorded in this memopad!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
And here's how it all started. 
On one of the times I went with my Mom when she went back home——

text_block_list.name: Gran's Mother
text_block_list.text:
That's right, Gran. Before we leave, I'll give you this. 
It's a 『Milecard』

text_block_list.name: Gran's Mother
text_block_list.text:
Those Miles that you love so much, 
when riding an airplane you'll save up a bunch.

text_block_list.name: Young Gran
text_block_list.text: ! The Miles!?

text_block_list.name: Young Gran
text_block_list.text:
I-it's true! 
I've saved up 5000 miles……!

text_block_list.name: Young Gran
text_block_list.text:
Mama! Buy me a memopad! All of the ones that I see 
while in the car, I want to write them down too!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: And so, all the Miles I've saved up are right here!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe! And just like this, when I look at all the Miles 
I've saved up, the power just keeps welling up, you know～
choice_data_list: Saving? You're not going to use them?

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
? Yeah! 
If I spend them, there'll be less of them!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Except maybe when they're about to expire, I guess? 
But, not until the very end! Otherwise they'll decrease!

It was a little unusual, but I guess it was just like her. 
And besides……

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Miles! Miles! Mile-rurun♪ 
With Miles! For Miles～? Mile-rurun♪

……She seemed to be so happy reading over her 
notepad that I thought maybe I should try it too.
